Description: Green glazed composition amuletic figure of Sekhmet-Mut as a lioness-headed woman offering her breast to a child standing against her legs, the two are protected by the wings of goddess standing at the back; the headdresses and suspension ring have broken away.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.23
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2022 19 May – 25 Sept, London, British Museum, Feminine Power
Condition: incomplete - suspension ring and headdress missing
